 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חוּט‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חִיט‎</span>] **verb** ==repair== (foundations); — 

**Hilph.** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יַחִ֫יטוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]] (si vera lectio [[[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA.</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>1884, 1018</sup> [[BDB#Str|Str]]<sup>§ 13 b</sup>]), rare from for <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְהִיטוּן‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§§ 16, 5. 26. 1</sup> [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>§ 63 g. Anm.</sup>, but perhaps read this, and regard as **Qal** (original meaning dubious; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***sew***, = [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חוּט‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּט‎</span> ***thread***; Syriac Pa. Also ***join together*** (so here [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>ZAW</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>xxii (1902).</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>162 Anm</sup>.), compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***conjunxit*** trabes (de Goeje<sup>Bibl. Geogr. Arab., Participle iv (1879), Glossary 231: compare Participle viii (1894), Glossary P. xx</sup>); [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>ZAW xix (1899), 180</sup> conjecture ***pull down*** and clear away (for rebuilding), compare <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—aia‰u***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB 274</sup>; [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>KB vi. 344</sup> compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—â‰u***</u></abbr>, ***observe***, ***learn*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB</sup> I. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎היט‎</span>), i.e. ***examine, test***; [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>Gu. Ezra-Neh 62</sup> conjectures √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חטט‎</span> ***excauate***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***secure*** site ***by a mark, found*** a town; [[BDB#Str|Str]]<sup>Gr (1905) 40</sup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְהִיבוּ‎</span> (after Seybold), compare [[Ezra.5.16|Ezra 5:16]] and others conjecture ***build wall***, denominative, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wall*** (√ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***guard, surround***)).
